alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 10:22AM AKST until January 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS THE CENTRAL AND NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain along the transition zone between Wrangell and Kake and up to Yakutat. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has started to become wetter. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 11 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Elfin Cove, and Pelican * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue to become wetter. Transition to rain will occur in Pelican and Tenakee Springs as early as late Monday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to check on their property. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
